title: Blanket, "Sampler Blanket  #1", 2004
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Very dark blue background with bands of dark brown and taupe at the top. On the left side, bands of geometric borders in light blue and a pink patterned house, sideways. In the lower left, two interlocking hearts machine embroidered in red. In the lower right, a large yellow palm tree, and a light blue patterned R. In the upper right corner, three snowflakes in off-white.
